ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind Plasma and Radio Waves (WAVES) Electron Plasma Densities, Level H0 (H0), 17.664 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated to SPASE Version 2.3.2 if needed, Applied quality control for DOI usage, LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: Wind Waves high time resolution plasma densities estimated by using the electron density inferred from the thermal noise peak as recognized by a neural network.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator M.L. Kaiser for use of the Data

PublicationInfo.Authors: Bougeret, Jean-Louis H.; Macdowall, Robert J.; Goetz, Keith; & Kellogg, Paul J.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, UTC
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags, Coordinated Universal Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, PB5 format
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Time in PB5 format: Year, Day, and Milliseconds of Day
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Electron Number Density
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electron Number Density, determined from the in situ electron plasma frequency, Fpe, line position as recognized by a neural network
Parameter.Caveats: The actual resolution depends on instrument mode and may vary

Parameter.Name: Electric Field Power, Thermal Noise Peak
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electric Field Power, in dB at the peak frequency as selected by the neural network algorithm

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Electron Density
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Post Gap Flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Post Gap Flag: 0=No gap, 1=No valid data
